TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ScrollPattern/ScrollPatternInformation extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 使用 物件的 或 存取子，提供該物件的屬性值存取。

span.span: Provides access to the property values of a object using its or accessors.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HorizontallyScrollable As Boolean
public: property bool HorizontallyScrollable { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出使用者介面自動化項目是否可以水平捲動。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the UI Automation element can scroll horizontally.

value.span: 如果使用者介面自動化項目可以水平捲動，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the UI Automation element can scroll horizontally; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以是動態的。This property can be dynamic. 比方說，內容區域的使用者介面自動化項目可能不能大於目前的檢視區域中，意義是`false`。For example, the content area of the UI Automation element might not be larger than the current viewable area, meaning is `false`. 不過，調整大小[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素或新增子系項目可以增加區域的界限內容超出可檢視區域中，表示是`true`。However, resizing the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or adding child items can increase the bounds of the content area beyond the viewable area, indicating that is `true`. ## Examples 在下列範例中，取自使用者介面自動化項目控制項模式，且再用來水平捲動的項目要求的數量。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from a UI Automation element and is then used to horizontally scroll the element the requested amount. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#107](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#107)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#107](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#107)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HorizontalScrollPercent As Double
public: property double HorizontalScrollPercent { double get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前的水平捲軸位置。

span.span: Gets the current horizontal scroll position.

value.span: 水平捲動位置，為總計內容區域在使用者介面自動化項目中的百分比。

span.span: The horizontal scroll position as a percentage of the total content area within the UI Automation element.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下列範例中，取自目標控制項的物件會傳遞至函式，擷取目前的內容區域內可檢視區域的水平和垂直捲動百分比。In the following example, a object obtained from a target control is passed into a function that retrieves the current horizontal and vertical scroll percentages of the viewable region within the content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#1045](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#1045)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#1045](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#1045)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HorizontalViewSize As Double
public: property double HorizontalViewSize { double get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前的水平檢視大小。

span.span: Gets the current horizontal view size.

value.span: 可檢視區域的水平大小，為總計內容區域在使用者介面自動化項目中的百分比。

span.span: The horizontal size of the viewable region as a percentage of the total content area within the UI Automation element.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下列範例中，取自目標控制項的物件會傳遞至函式，擷取目前的垂直和水平大小，可檢視區域為總計內容區域的百分比。In the following example, a object obtained from a target control is passed into a function that retrieves the current vertical and horizontal sizes of the viewable region as percentages of the total content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#1055](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#1055)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#1055](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#1055)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VerticallyScrollable As Boolean
public: property bool VerticallyScrollable { bool get(); };

summary.span: 擷取值，指出使用者介面自動化項目是否可以垂直捲動。

span.span: Retrieves a value that indicates whether the UI Automation element can scroll vertically.

value.span: 如果使用者介面自動化項目可以水平捲動，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the UI Automation element can scroll horizontally; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以是動態的。This property can be dynamic. 比方說，內容區域的使用者介面自動化項目可能不能大於目前的檢視區域中，意義是`false`。For example, the content area of the UI Automation element might not be larger than the current viewable area, meaning is `false`. 不過，調整大小[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素或新增子系項目可以增加區域的界限內容超出可檢視區域中，表示是`true`。However, resizing the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or adding child items can increase the bounds of the content area beyond the viewable area, indicating that is `true`. ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式從使用者介面自動化項取得，而接著會使用垂直捲動項目要求的數量。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from a UI Automation element and is then used to vertically scroll the element the requested amount. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#108)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#108)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VerticalScrollPercent As Double
public: property double VerticalScrollPercent { double get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前的垂直捲動位置。

span.span: Gets the current vertical scroll position.

value.span: 垂直捲動位置，為總計內容區域在使用者介面自動化項目中的百分比。

span.span: The vertical scroll position as a percentage of the total content area within the UI Automation element.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下列範例中，取自目標控制項的物件會傳遞至函式，擷取目前的內容區域內可檢視區域的水平和垂直捲動百分比。In the following example, a object obtained from a target control is passed into a function that retrieves the current horizontal and vertical scroll percentages of the viewable region within the content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#1045](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#1045)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#1045](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#1045)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VerticalViewSize As Double
public: property double VerticalViewSize { double get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前的垂直檢視大小。

span.span: Gets the current vertical view size.

value.span: 可檢視區域的垂直大小，為總計內容區域在使用者介面自動化項目中的百分比。

span.span: The vertical size of the viewable region as a percentage of the total content area within the UI Automation element.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下列範例中，取自目標控制項的物件會傳遞至函式，擷取目前的垂直和水平大小，可檢視區域為總計內容區域的百分比。In the following example, a object obtained from a target control is passed into a function that retrieves the current vertical and horizontal sizes of the viewable region as percentages of the total content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#1055](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#1055)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#1055](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#1055)]
